categories: Category:Sith Lords of the reconstituted Sith Empire

nodes.text: Shesta Kancen was a male Human who held the title of Sith Lord within the reconstituted Sith Empire. During the Battle of Corellia in the Galactic War, he was stationed at the Coronet Spaceport on the planet Corellia, where he shared his knowledge with fellow Sith Inquisitors.
Lord Shesta Kancen appears in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic, released by BioWare in 2011, as a class trainer for the Sith Inquisitor class on Corellia.
